  proposition: Yingqian Cui, Jie Ren, Yuping Lin, Han Xu, Pengfei He, Yue Xing, Lingjuan Lyu, Wenqi Fan, Hui Liu, and Jiliang Tang published a paper titled "FT-Shield: A Watermark Against Unauthorized Fine-Tuning in Text-to-Image Diffusion Models" in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yingqian Cui|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Jie Ren|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Yuping Lin|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Han Xu|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Pengfei He|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Yue Xing|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Lingjuan Lyu|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Wenqi Fan|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Hui Liu|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    Jiliang Tang|PUBLISHED|FT-Shield
    FT-Shield|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    FT-Shield|DESCRIBED_BY|Watermark Against Unauthorized Fine-Tuning in Text-to-Image Diffusion Models

    entity-entity relationships:
    FT-Shield|FOCUSES_ON|Text-to-Image Diffusion Models

  proposition: Pierre Fernandez, Guillaume Couairon, Hervé Jégou, Matthijs Douze, and Teddy Furon published a paper titled "The Stable Signature: Rooting Watermarks in Latent Diffusion Models" in the IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pierre Fernandez|PUBLISHED|Stable Signature
    Guillaume Couairon|PUBLISHED|Stable Signature
    Hervé Jégou|PUBLISHED|Stable Signature
    Matthijs Douze|PUBLISHED|Stable Signature
    Teddy Furon|PUBLISHED|Stable Signature
    Stable Signature|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    Stable Signature|DESCRIBED_BY|Rooting Watermarks in Latent Diffusion Models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Stable Signature|PRESENTED_AT|IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision
    Stable Signature|FOCUSES_ON|Latent Diffusion Models

  proposition: Liangqi Lei, Keke Gai, Jing Yu, and Liehuang Zhu published a paper titled "DiffuseTrace: A Transparent and Flexible Watermarking Scheme for Latent Diffusion Model" in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Liangqi Lei|PUBLISHED|DiffuseTrace
    Keke Gai|PUBLISHED|DiffuseTrace
    Jing Yu|PUBLISHED|DiffuseTrace
    Liehuang Zhu|PUBLISHED|DiffuseTrace
    DiffuseTrace|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    DiffuseTrace|DESCRIBED_BY|Transparent and Flexible Watermarking Scheme for Latent Diffusion Model

    entity-entity relationships:
    DiffuseTrace|FOCUSES_ON|Latent Diffusion Model

  proposition: Cheng Xiong, Chuan Qin, Guorui Feng, and Xinpeng Zhang published a paper titled "Flexible and Secure Watermarking for Latent Diffusion Model" in the ACM International Conference on Multimedia in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Cheng Xiong|PUBLISHED|Flexible and Secure Watermarking
    Chuan Qin|PUBLISHED|Flexible and Secure Watermarking
    Guorui Feng|PUBLISHED|Flexible and Secure Watermarking
    Xinpeng Zhang|PUBLISHED|Flexible and Secure Watermarking
    Flexible and Secure Watermarking|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2023
    Flexible and Secure Watermarking|DESCRIBED_BY|Watermarking for Latent Diffusion Model

    entity-entity relationships:
    Flexible and Secure Watermarking|PRESENTED_AT|ACM International Conference on Multimedia
    Flexible and Secure Watermarking|FOCUSES_ON|Latent Diffusion Model

  proposition: Zhen Tan and colleagues published a survey on "Large Language Models for Data Annotation and Synthesis" in the Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zhen Tan|PUBLISHED|Large Language Models for Data Annotation and Synthesis
    Large Language Models for Data Annotation and Synthesis|PUBLICATION_YEAR|2024
    Large Language Models for Data Annotation and Synthesis|TYPE|Survey

    entity-entity relationships:
    Large Language Models for Data Annotation and Synthesis|PRESENTED_AT|Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
